teams.name: SLAM
teams.loan_because: We have all needed a helping hand at some point in our lives.  We all have dreams.  Our community is full of powerful energy and we want to help change lives.
teams.description: Slam is creative group of people.  We are both artists and those who appreciate art in all it's many forms.

teams.name: Barnard College
teams.loan_because: we believe that access to economic opportunity is fundamental to women's autonomy and self-determination.
teams.description: Barnard is a liberal arts college dedicated to the education and empowerment of women.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Essence on Lambton, Wellington
teams.loan_because: We believe in the empowerment of woman world wide and want all woman to have the ability to have success in their lives.
teams.description: A group of passionate woman entrepreneurs.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.loan_because: we care.
teams.description: Canadians reaching out to the rest of the world and helping any which way we can.

teams.name: First Responders
teams.loan_because: The Kiva organization strives to make the world a better place. Of all the charitable causes, this seems to be the most rewarding. 100% of our loans go to the people designated to receive the loan interest free.
teams.description: Our team consists of policemen, fire and rescue, paramedics, nurses, and all our friends and families.

teams.name: Kiva Fire EMS
teams.loan_because: We loan because badly needed resources are otherwise difficult to obtain using traditional methods.  We loan because it is a win-win for humanity across the globe.
teams.description: We are Firefighters, Emergency Medical Technicians, Paramedics, First Responders  and anyone associated with responding to emergency incidents alla cross the globe. We each share the compassion of providing service and care in times of need each day. We wish to extend that same compassion to those who have the desire and ability to improve their lives on a very basic level.

teams.name: Aircraft Owners and Pilots
teams.loan_because:
We can. Its a better feeling than going for the $100 hamburger. OK, OK, Its a $150 hamburger with the new fuel costs.

OSM 2008: A Year of Edits from ItoWorld on Vimeo.
teams.description: Being a pilot is like nothing else. The respect we have for eachother, the care for the equipment and the bug that we all have been bit by.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Mensa
teams.loan_because: Goals of the association involve "identify and foster human intelligence for the benefit of humanity" and "to encourage research into the nature, characteristics, and uses of intelligence".
teams.description:
We are members of Mensa from all around the world. 
Mensa is an international association of people with high IQ, who usually share some interests and hobbies.
One of the purposes of the association is to provide a stimulating intellectual and social environment for high IQ people.
Mensa is strictly neutral in politics and religious issues.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Russia
teams.loan_because: we can
teams.description: Russians that make a difference

teams.name: Ukulele Players United to decrease World Suck
teams.loan_because: We Care
teams.description: Ukulele Players united.

teams.name: Metafilter
teams.description: Where everyone is a captain!

teams.name: KIVA Shopping Club
teams.loan_because: We can.
teams.description: The KivaFriends KSC is currently inactive, for more information please review this thread on KivaFriends: http://www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,533.0.html

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Persian Peeps
teams.loan_because: We believe in community and doing good for our neighbors.
teams.description:
A place where like-minded Persians/Iranians come together and give to a cause that encourages and helps entrepreneurship. 

And a request to our friends at Kiva - Please look into helping our brothers and sisters in Iran and Afghanistan!

teams.name: Iranians On Kiva
teams.loan_because: We see all of humanity as one giant community regardless of race, creed, ethnicity, religious beliefs, economical or other barriers and it is a large part of our upbringing and culture to help when we can.
teams.description: Iranians (and others) from across the globe joining one another to lend a hand to those that can use it.

teams.name: In Memory and to Honor women affected by violence
teams.loan_because: To honor and keep in our memory women who are affected by violence around the world.
teams.description: This group first created to honor the life of Neda, the Iranian student who was killed during a peace protest.

teams.name: Joyce D Patterson
teams.loan_because: Joyce was a very generous individual and she would have loved this. She is an angel... We believe this and hold it true to our hearts. photo of Joyce circa 1987.
teams.description: We loan in memory of Joyce. Her memory is important to continue into the future. She would have liked this very much. by Miranda, Jeff, Julio and many friends.

teams.name: Iranian American Philanthropy Team
teams.loan_because: It's an engrained part of our culture to help our fellow (wo)man and we are united to do our part in the global community.

teams.name: UK
teams.loan_because: ...every little helps
teams.description:
We are a team of lenders whose common interest is that we are all based in, originally from, or somehow linked to the United Kingdom.
 
Any lenders who wish to join, please feel free... and please invite your friends :-)

teams.name: Tecno-Tools.com
teams.loan_because: Desideriamo aiutare a realizzare il sogno di quegli imprenditori che con le loro idee ed il loro talento vogliono creare una vita migliore per se e per gli altri.
teams.description:
La missione aziendale della Tecno-Tools è quella di produrre profitto, aiutando la piccola e media impresa a creare valore per se e per la propria nazione, fornendo
attrezzature tecniche alle migliori condizioni di mercato.

teams.name: Angelheads
teams.loan_because: We believe in angels and glam rock music!

teams.name: Credituga
teams.loan_because: we're just a bunch of good honest working tugas. So we don't have much to ourselves anyway. And this makes the whole thing much more interesting.
teams.description:
This team joins friends and co-workers, some of them have been brute forced into Kiva has there were no other available  way of making them understand that, as a good broke tuga, your destiny is to share with people with less resources. 
This was just the beginning...
 We invite everybody that shares the tuga spirit to join our team.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

Ein Team für alle Hamburger Deerns un Jungs und alle die es gerne wären.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.

teams.name: Kirche Kelzenberg
teams.loan_because: As Christians we love to share. Kiva is such a grand idea: Empowering people all over the world to help themselves on a one to one basis.
teams.description: We are a very lively church in a rural area in Juechen-Kelzenberg close to Cologne and Duesseldorf in Germany.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Leeds United Fans
teams.loan_because:
We want to make a difference. We will make the world a better place by helping one person at a time. 
Marching On Together!!!
teams.description: We are joined by our support for Leeds United Football Club and our willingness to help others less fortunate than ourselves.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

We aim to decrease world suck.

www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Friendly Planet Travel
teams.loan_because: We would like the opportunity to give back to the different countries and locations where we send travelers.
teams.description: A team of caring travelers that would like to continue making a difference around the world.

teams.name: Sisters of St Joseph of Peace
teams.loan_because: "We value the mutuality that empowers people to share in decisions that affect their lives, and we work in a collaborative way to achieve this." (CSJP Constitution 26)
teams.description: Congregation of the Sisters of St. Joseph of Peace.  International community of Catholic Sisters and lay men and women associates committed to pursuing social justice as a path to peace.

teams.name: Congregation Sisters of St. Joseph of Peace (CSJP)
teams.loan_because: "From the beginning we were founded and organized to meet the needs and call of the times." (Sheila Lemieux, 21st General Chapter)
teams.description:
"Our history calls us to a special love
for those who are poor. 
The weight of suffering and oppression
borne by so many people today, 
especially those who are economically poor,
cries out to us for action.
Our response demands a firm commitment
to work for justice
in solidarity with our sisters and brothers." 
(Constitution 21)

teams.name: ca$h $oup
teams.loan_because: we can.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Intuit
teams.loan_because: Intuit is honored to dedicate the efforts of our Kiva lending team to the memory of our friend and colleague Anne Henderson. Anne passed away in September 2010 after a long battle with cancer. She was a bright light to everyone around her and was passionate about helping entrepreneurs through Kiva. We are inspired by her compassion, and are honored to continue her efforts to alleviate poverty. Anne, you will be greatly missed.
teams.description: At Intuit, corporate social responsibility is more than just a business practice, it's a longstanding part of who we are. It's our culture. It's one of our core values: We Care & Give Back. Anyone may join and invite others to join the Intuit lending team.

teams.name: HALF THE SKY: Empowering Women
teams.loan_because: we believe empowering women is the key to alleviating social injustice and achieving world stability.
teams.description:
Inspired by the book HALF THE SKY written by Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn, our team is committed to helping curb culturally accepted abuse of women around the world.

Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/HALFTHESKYEmpoweringWomenKIVATeam
